page.title: 03POLLUTION COVENTRY S.W.
page.content: At the centre of{Whitley Abbey}school there is a lake.In 1983 it was polluted after vandals burst an oil pipe.All of the fish in the lake died.Volunteers helped by Coventry Junior Chamber,the L.E.A.and professional contractors cleared the lake.Now there are wildfowl nesting in the reeds.They have put in roach and carp.If you want a fishing permit, see the caretaker.The lake is beautiful again. The{pumping station}in Whitley has been out of action because of contamination.Scientists are trying to trace the source of the pollution. It may have been caused by the illegal dumping of chemical waste,which is a common problem in many parts of the country today.
